mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.pay_mode AS "payMode", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.pay_account AS "payAccount", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_pay_info( id, order_id, pay_mode, pay_time, pay_account, pay_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{payMode}, #{payTime}, #{payAccount}, #{payStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_pay_info SET order_id = #{orderId}, pay_mode = #{payMode}, pay_time = #{payTime}, pay_account = #{payAccount}, pay_status = #{payStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
